Dependencies

   <details><summary><a>APT (Ubuntu, Debian Linux)</a></summary>

   BLAS,        ``libblas-dev``
   SuiteSparse, ``suitesparse-dev``
   SuperLU,     ``superlu-dev``
   MySQL*,      ``libmysqlclient-dev``
   Tcl*,        ``tcl-dev``
